purpose.summary: This program is a COBOL subroutine that wraps the CEEDAYS API to validate a Gregorian date string (provided via linkage) against a specified format mask. It prepares VSTRING inputs, invokes CEEDAYS to compute Lillian date (discarding the result), processes the feedback code to populate a diagnostic message in LS-RESULT, and sets RETURN-CODE to severity.
purpose.business_context: Facilitates standardized date string validation in mainframe legacy systems, converting to Lillian date format for reliable date arithmetic, validation, and error reporting in business processes like financial transactions or reporting where date accuracy is critical.

inputs.name: LS-DATE
inputs.description: 10-character input date string to be validated by CEEDAYS

inputs.name: LS-DATE-FORMAT
inputs.description: 10-character date format mask for interpreting LS-DATE

outputs.name: LS-RESULT
outputs.description: 80-character output message containing severity, message number, result description, test date, and format mask

outputs.name: RETURN-CODE
outputs.description: Severity value extracted from CEEDAYS feedback code

called_programs.purpose: Validates date string to Lillian date conversion based on input date and format mask, providing feedback code

business_rules.description: If CEEDAYS feedback is zero (FC-INVALID-DATE), classify date as valid
business_rules.logic_summary: EVALUATE sets WS-RESULT to 'Date is valid'

business_rules.description: If CEEDAYS feedback indicates insufficient data, report 'Insufficient'
If CEEDAYS feedback indicates bad date value, report 'Datevalue error'
If CEEDAYS feedback indicates invalid era, report 'Invalid Era    '
If CEEDAYS feedback indicates unsupported range, report 'Unsupp. Range  '
If CEEDAYS feedback indicates invalid month, report 'Invalid month  '
If CEEDAYS feedback indicates bad picture string, report 'Bad Pic String '
business_rules.logic_summary: EVALUATE sets WS-RESULT to 'Bad Pic String '

business_rules.description: If CEEDAYS feedback indicates non-numeric data, report 'Nonnumeric data'
If CEEDAYS feedback indicates year in era zero, report 'YearInEra is 0 '
For any other unrecognized CEEDAYS feedback code, default to 'Date is invalid'
business_rules.logic_summary: EVALUATE WHEN OTHER sets WS-RESULT to 'Date is invalid'

transforms.transformation_description: Length moved to Vstring-length and content to Vstring-text for CEEDAYS input
Length moved to Vstring-length and content to Vstring-text for CEEDAYS input
Extracts severity code from FEEDBACK-CODE structure to WS-MESSAGE severity field
Extracts message number from FEEDBACK-CODE structure to WS-MESSAGE message number field
EVALUATE maps condition to WS-RESULT text based on 88-levels; WS-DATE-TO-TEST copied to WS-DATE; WS-DATE-FORMAT to WS-DATE-FMT

paragraphs.purpose: Prepares WS-DATE-TO-TEST and WS-DATE-FORMAT VSTRINGs from linkage inputs, calls CEEDAYS, extracts feedback details, and evaluates condition to set result message
Provides THRU exit point after A000-MAIN processing

error_handling.action: Sets WS-RESULT to 'Date is valid'; populates WS-MESSAGE with details; sets RETURN-CODE to severity; continues normally
Sets WS-RESULT to 'Insufficient'; populates WS-MESSAGE; sets RETURN-CODE to severity; continues normally
Sets WS-RESULT to 'Datevalue error'; populates WS-MESSAGE; sets RETURN-CODE to severity; continues normally
Sets WS-RESULT to 'Invalid Era    '; populates WS-MESSAGE; sets RETURN-CODE to severity; continues normally
Sets WS-RESULT to 'Unsupp. Range  '; populates WS-MESSAGE; sets RETURN-CODE to severity; continues normally
Sets WS-RESULT to 'Invalid month  '; populates WS-MESSAGE; sets RETURN-CODE to severity; continues normally
Sets WS-RESULT to 'Bad Pic String '; populates WS-MESSAGE; sets RETURN-CODE to severity; continues normally
Sets WS-RESULT to 'Nonnumeric data'; populates WS-MESSAGE; sets RETURN-CODE to severity; continues normally
Sets WS-RESULT to 'YearInEra is 0 '; populates WS-MESSAGE; sets RETURN-CODE to severity; continues normally
Sets WS-RESULT to 'Date is invalid'; populates WS-MESSAGE; sets RETURN-CODE to severity; continues normally

open_questions.question: Precise meaning of Lillian date format and CEEDAYS format masks
open_questions.context: Not defined in source code; only referenced as output type and input format
open_questions.suggestion: Consult LE/CEEDAYS documentation or run with sample inputs

open_questions.question: Why FC-INVALID-DATE (value zeros) maps to 'Date is valid'
open_questions.context: Condition name suggests error but zero value and success message indicate it is the success case
